text: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.
translation.id.indonesian: lalu ia membacakannya kepada mereka (orang-orang kafir); niscaya mereka tidak akan beriman kepadanya.
